comments:
build i0521-0800

Not sure if this is reproducable but you might be able to protect against it
from the stack trace.

- I had checked out a ton of projects (most of the modules on dev.eclipse.org)
from CVS and compiled
- exited 
- came back in
- tried to run a runtime workbench
- it failed (couldn't load swt.dll)
- saw a bunch of compile errors
- realized i needed to rename the .classpath file for swt
- renamed the file
- it started a build
- after the build completed I exited my workbench and got the following in my
console

You gotta start checking for dups or reading the build notes or the releng 
messages or ... :-)



*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 63374 ***

I was able to check mail at 8am and then again at 11:45 and sporatically this
afternoon...our mail server has been up and down all day. (actually I'm serious!)

I did a query for the name of the class at the top of the stack but I must have
only picked NEW/ASSIGNED/REOPENED. I should have known that you guys are good
enough to have it already fixed. :-)

I think I'll go home now. :-)
Yes...please take the rest of the day off :-)
be careful or I'll re-open the "running man" icon bug report! :-)
